assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflicts of interest or competing interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The study was approved by the institutional review boards of each collaborative site. Written consent for sample storage and genetic analyses of peripheral blood and invasive diagnostic samples was obtained from each participant.
